WCPprior 1.0

Package index

WCPprior package

WCPprior
Wasserstein Complexity Penalization Priors

Analytical WCP priors

WCP2_1D_Gaussian_mean_analytic()
The 1d analytic density WCP2 prior for mean of Gaussian distribution
WCP2_1D_Gaussian_precision_analytic()
The 1d analytic density WCP2 prior for tau (1/variance) of Gaussian distribution
WCP1_1D_GPtail_analytic()
The 1d analytic density WCP prior for xi of generalized Pareto distribution
WCP2_1D_AR1_analytic()
The 1d analytic density WCP prior for phi of stationary AR1 process
WCP2_2D_Gaussian_analytic()
The 2d analytic density WCP prior for mean and standard deviation of Gaussian distribution
WCP1_2D_GP_analytic()
The 2d analytic density WCP prior for sigma and xi of generalized Pareto distribution

Numerical approximation of WCP priors

WCP_1D_Numerical_Density()
The 1d numerical density WCP prior
WCP_2D_Numerical_Density()
The 2d numerical approximation of WCP prior

Auxiliary functions

compute_partial_arc_lengths()
Compute partial arc lengths
